Package it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.message

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GenericMessage
    Common interface among all the messages
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BanMessage
    Message used to set the Bans in the View when the game starts
    BanRequest
    Message used to know in View which ban is controlled in this moment by the Controller
    BanUpdateMessage
    Message used to notify the assignment of a Ban to a Player in the View
    BonusBarMessage
    Class used to send the bonus bars from the controller to the view
    CancelCardRequest  
    CardRequest
    Class used to ask a request to the player, e.g. choose between two effects or two costs or if the player wants to pay for an effect
    CardsMessage
    Class used to notify the cards placed in a tower
    CardUpdateMessage
    Message used to notify the movement of a Card (A player taked a card from a tower)
    CouncilRequest
    Request used to know which council the player wants
    DiceMessage
    Message used to update the dice values in the View
    DiscardLeaderCard  
    EmptyMove
    Simple message used to notify the Controller that the specify player doesn't want to do a move
    FamiliarUpdateMessage
    Message which represent the movement of a familiar
    FinalRequest
    Message used to know which final card effects the player wants to enable
    ImmediateRequest
    Class used to know which immediate card effect player wants to enable
    LeaderCardMessage
    Message used to choose the leader card in the view
    LeaderCardUpdateMessage
    Class used to know which leader card the player wants to enable
    LoginMessage
    Class to know which user name the player wants.
    Message
    Abstract class used to represent all the Game Messages.
    PayRequest
    This request is created to know which cost player wants to pay
    PermanentRequest
    Used to know which permanent card effect player wants to enable
    PlayerMove
    Class that contains the informations given from the player The game logic parse these information to create a complete Action
    PlayersListMessage
    Message sent when a player is connecting to the ServerView to inform him of which players are playing in the current match
    PlayerToken
    Message to notify the View that the player has to do an Action, wraps a Player Move and an Action Prototype for the bonus Actions
    ReconnectMessage  
    ResourceUpdateMessage
    Message sent when the player increase/decrease his resources
    WinnerMessage
    Message sent when a match finished
